original_title: The Cartoon Cowboys: Spirit of the Alamo
overview: Escorting a wagon full of children from their hometown of Tumbleweed Valley to the remains of the Alamo in Texas, singing cowboy band Riders In The Sky keep the kids entertained with songs and stories of the Alamo's most-famous defender: Davy Crockett!
title: The Cartoon Cowboys: Spirit of the Alamo
